data.text: @Jstanthrnobdy @EricTopol @CDCgov Just how exactly would you test a vaccine against variants that haven't happened yet?🤔

@EricTopol @CDCgov So glad that all 🇺🇸 children are able to get vaccinated 🙃 #offlabelU5 @ImmunizeUnder5s
@EricTopol @Bob_Wachter @CDCgov But even mild cases cause brain damage,so what are we doing?

@EricTopol @LizSzabo @CDCgov Last week our local news broadcast stated that vaccines are only about 13% effective against omicron. Is that not correct? Also, how many deaths have occurred from regular annual flu? Every year we’ve had stats on this published but not this last flu season.
@StefanRR4 @MNajeddine @EricTopol @CDCgov Eh no? Everyobodu should get the each year, since the immunity wanes and the strains are different each year

@springbokVXOne @ZLaqueefa @EricTopol @CDCgov “Displayed in this way it can be seen that apart from in those aged under 18 we’re seeing a broadly level but negative vaccine effectiveness for one and two doses, with a rapidly declining vaccine effectiveness for three doses of vaccine.”
